text: @SenTedCruz @realdonaldtrump @VP @SecPompeo @PeterNavarro45  Thank you Senator for calling out the evil CCP. From fentanyl to coronavirus, from south sea to 1 belt 1 road, CCP attempt to destroy the US and control the world! Time is running out, action now.
